features.name: Risk
features.description: Any mentioned risks, dangers, or negative impacts of AI development.
features.synthesis_topic: Their risk assessment (ie what risks does AI development pose)

features.name: Goal
features.description: High-level goals, missions, or objectives (e.g., 'AI alignment' or global AI agreement).
features.synthesis_topic: The goals (often pretty high-level e.g. 'AI alignment')

features.name: Method
features.description: Strategies, activities, or actions taken to achieve the goals (research, grantmaking, policy work, etc.).
features.synthesis_topic: The methods used in service of the goals
